title: Scorpions-Virgin Killer 1976 (With Original Cover)
description:
Scorpions-Virgin Killer 1976 (With Original Cover)
CD to mp3 256 mbit/s
Virgin Killer is the fourth studio album by the German heavy metal band Scorpions. It was released in 1976, and was the first album of the band to attract attention outside Europe.The original cover, featuring a naked prepubescent girl, stirred controversy in the United States and elsewhere. It was subsequently reissued with a different cover.More info about the cover is in the torrent.

Included:  Covers/Original cover info/Lyrics

(01) 1. Pictured Life  (Meine, Roth, Schenker)  3:21
(02) 2. Catch Your Train  (Meine, Schenker)  3:32
(03) 3. In Your Park  (Meine, Schenker)  3:39
(04) 4. Backstage Queen  (Meine, Schenker)  3:10
(05) 5. Virgin Killer  (Roth)  3:41
Side two
(06) 1. Hell Cat  (Roth)  2:54
(07) 2. Crying Days  (Meine, Schenker)  4:36
(08) 3. Polar Nights  (Roth)  5:04
(09) 4. Yellow Raven  (Roth)  4:58

Line up
Klaus Meine  lead vocals
Ulrich Roth  lead guitar, lead vocals on "Hell-Cat" and "Polar Nights"
Rudolf Schenker  rhythm guitar, backing vocals
Francis Buchholz  bass, backing vocals
Rudy Lenners  drums, percussion
